response.overview: "The whole world is a stage and all people are actors.  They rise and fall in turn, each one:  A man plays several roles in life,  And the acts are the seven ages..."  (William Shakespeare, How You Like It)  The story of a man - Mihai Sarca - for whom the theater means everything and for whom a whole life defined himself by his passion for the stage and for the people who serve it, thus becoming the treasurer of an archive collection and, at the same time, a living encyclopedia of the Romanian theatrical phenomenon of the last century.
response.title: The Butterfly Collector
